name: Gummy Fruit Blast
description:
Join our chef in a whole new adventure. He has learnt the best fruit salad recipe in the whole world, but he needs your help for one thing: Matching the fruits.

The task is quite simple, yet very amusing! Just match 3 pieces of fruit of the same kind to collect the fresh fruit and increase the points in you scoreboard.

You know our chef is sort of picky, so choose only the ones alike: Strawberries with strawberries, apples with apples and so on. There are many levels full of fun and amusement. You won't be able to stop!

Show you have the skills needed to impress the cook and he will reveal the secret fruit salad recipe with you. Tell no one!

Game Features:
• Tons of fun
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
• Thousands of pieces of fruit to match
• More leveles, very soon!
